attributes.action: FREE GYM MEMBERSHIP to any individual who suffers from Mental Health Problems
attributes.background: Healthy body supports a healthy mind - so I wish for anyone whos feeling low to have the opportunity to go to their local gym and be able to freely use the service and get help with voluntary personal trainers. it's also a great way to socialize and keep their minds focused on positive things

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. It is unclear who would be eligible for free gym memberships and what type of mental health conditions you would like included.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. This might, for example, ask for funding for the NHS to provide free gym memberships to individuals with specific mental health conditions.
